targets.queryText: SELECT json_extract(payload_json,'$.as_of_date_local') AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT json_extract(payload_json,'$.as_of_date_local') AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT json_extract(payload_json,'$.prices_as_of') AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT json_extract(payload_json,'$.prices_as_of') AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT COALESCE(json_array_length(json_extract(payload_json,'$.missing_prices')), 0) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT COALESCE(json_array_length(json_extract(payload_json,'$.missing_prices')), 0) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.coverage.derived_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.coverage.derived_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT json_extract(m.value, '$') AS symbol FROM snapshot_daily_current, json_each(json_extract(payload_json,'$.missing_prices')) AS m ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 12;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT json_extract(m.value, '$') AS symbol FROM snapshot_daily_current, json_each(json_extract(payload_json,'$.missing_prices')) AS m ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 12;
